summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new features: Sponsored Links Analytics, Trending Downloads Section, and Download Activity Tracking. All 16 backend tests passed. All frontend UI components working correctly.
passed_tests: Sponsored click tracking API (/api/sponsored/{id}/click) - tracks clicks successfully
Trending downloads API (/api/downloads/trending) - returns trending items when enabled
Trending enable/disable via admin settings - toggle works correctly
Download activity tracking API (/api/downloads/{id}/track) - increments count and records activity
Top downloads API (/api/downloads/top) - returns sponsored items first
Site settings API - trending_downloads_enabled and trending_downloads_count fields work
Homepage displays TOP DOWNLOADS section with SPONSORED badge on sponsored items
Homepage displays TRENDING NOW section when enabled in admin
Homepage hides TRENDING NOW section when disabled in admin
Admin panel shows SPONSORED LINKS ANALYTICS card with 24h/7d/total clicks columns
Admin panel shows TRENDING DOWNLOADS SETTINGS card with ENABLED/DISABLED toggle
Admin panel REFRESH ANALYTICS button works
Admin panel UPDATE button for trending settings works
Clicking sponsored link on homepage tracks click (verified analytics increased from 5 to 6)
Clicking download link on homepage tracks activity for trending calculation
seed_data_creation: Database seeded with 4695 downloads, 1 sponsored download (Premium Software Pro) configured
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features fully tested: 1) Sponsored Links Analytics - clicking sponsored links tracks clicks, admin panel shows 24h/7d/total clicks in SPONSORED LINKS ANALYTICS card. 2) Trending Downloads - homepage shows TRENDING NOW section when enabled, admin panel has toggle to enable/disable. 3) Download Activity Tracking - /api/downloads/{id}/track endpoint both increments download count AND records activity for trending calculation. All APIs and UI components working correctly.
